Description:
Build Your Master Piece!!!
Situated in the highly sought after Cloverton Estate by Stocklands, this flat 400m2 parcel of land is nestled in the premium pocket of the development a short walk from the Cloverton display village and parks.
Close to a future Retail Centre set to be one of the largest in the northern metropolitan area, State Primary School, Private School, Proposed Regional Hospital, Medical Services and Parks.
Approximately 1.25 kms from Donnybrook Train Station and 38 kms from Melbourne CBD via Hume Freeway. 
Do not wait up to a year for off the plan releases in this red hot estate, jump the queue and build your dream home now.

The opportunity is here for the taking!
This vacant block of land in Kalkallo is titled and ready to build your dream home with aproxx 448sqm of land to play with. With a approx 14-metre frontage, this block is suitable for an array of home designs and provides the perfect opportunity for you to build your family home in this Highly sought-after Cloverton Estate.

For any developer/investor/or first home buyer, this is an incredible opportunity to invest your money wisely.

Description:
TITLED LAND READY TO BUILD IN CLOVERTON!!
Take advantage of this very rare opportunity to secure this block of vacant land approximately 350sqm with a frontage of 12.5m approx. and NO easements located in one of North's most sought after up and coming locations CLOVERTON. This block is titled and ready to build. Cloverton will become home to plenty of fantastic amenities, including schools, shopping, childcare, community centres and beautiful parks with amazing playgrounds. This block of land offers everything you need. Cloverton has proposed community centres, state primary and secondary schools, as well as tertiary institutions. Cloverton is soon be home to a proposed major retail and Metropolitan Activity Centre - catering for everything a growing community needs. Minutes from the existing Donnybrook Train Station and the future Train Station, access to the Melbourne CBD will be quick and easy. Backing onto the flowing Merri Creek and with 80 hectares of conservation area, Cloverton is perfect for nature lovers after a relaxed lifestyle. Stockland is Australia's leading developer of Green Star communities as recognised by the Green Building Council of Australia. Choosing a Green Star community can help you save money, create a healthy environment and minimise your environmental footprint, while building a better future for everyone. Also with all the Craigieburn facilities only minutes away including shops, schools, parkland and transport this parcel of land could make for the perfect new home site. This really is a great opportunity not to be missed!! Buy now before it's too late!!

This really is a great opportunity not to be missed!! Buy now before it's too late!!

Description:
541m2 in the heart of Kalkallo!
Reliance Real Estate presents a real opportunity that really presents itself to purchase for savvy investors, families this huge block of land, 541m2 (approx) in the heart of Kalkallo. The site of your dream home, this generous allotment presents a vast flat parcel with access to all town services, located in Cloverton Estates. Bordered on either side by streamlined commuting options, (Hume Highway access and the existing Vline Rail service), you will be set to benefit from a wealth of proposed amenities including a vibrant town with shopping centre, health facilities, quality schooling options and so much more. Nestled in a tranquil urban fringe, amongst other quality built homes, you are only minutes to Craigieburn Central, Epping shopping district, Donnybrook hotel and the Growling Frog golf course. A unique opportunity to create your dream lifestyle in the suburb of the future.
For any further enquiries do not hesitate to call Gary Verma on 0433 001 884 or Amit Kumar on 0422 048 842!
